alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Laurel; Rockcastle (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 6:01PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Laurel, southwestern Jackson and southeastern Rockcastle Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 600 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sinks, or near Mount Vernon, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Sand Hill and Dango around 610 PM EDT. Gauley and Horse Lick around 615 PM EDT. Ardery around 620 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Carico, Camp Wildcat, Hazel Patch, Lamero, Mershons, Templer, Luner, Wood Creek Lake, Cruise, Victory and Eberle. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
